720336f.title: Manhattan: Harlem River Drive - 155th Street (West)
720336f.text:
Harlem River Speedway (Driveway), north from West
155th Street, showing this serpentine roadway separating
the Polo Grounds, the Interborog,h Rapid Transit yards
and the river irom 2ighorioge Park. Tne hilly prominence
at the left was formerly known as Coogan's Bluff.
On the far side of the aarlem. River is the Bronx,
being joined to Manhattan by the High and Washington Bridges.
1909
Ewing Galloway
NO REPRODUCTIONS
Neg ~ 0SF
720336f.folder: Harlem River Drive & 155th Street (West), Manhattan, NY

720331f-a.title: Manhattan: Harlem River Drive - 155th Street (West)
720331f-a.text:
Harlem River Drive, north from West 155th Street, showing
the vehicular congestion at this point during a baseball
Eame at the Polo Grounds. In the background is the Harlem
River and its Bronx shore. High Bridge crosses same from
High Bridge Park in Manhattan.
May 19, 1940
No's. 1-2-3
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
720331f-a.folder: Harlem River Drive & 155th Street (West), Manhattan, NY
